dt-example.title: Basic StateRestore Example
dt-example.info:
This is the StateRestore extension for DataTables.
It provides a collection of buttons that allow DataTables states to be stored and restored at any point. Pressing the _Create State_ button will create a new state. This can then be accessed under the _Saved States_ button. Here the state can be loaded into the table, updated, removed or renamed.
There is no limit on the number of states that can be stored within StateRestore.
